apis.name: List all Debian distributions in a group
apis.description: Lists Debian distributions in the given group.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group.

attributes.name: codename
attributes.description: Filter with specific codename.

attributes.name: suite
attributes.description: Filter with specific suite.

apis.name: Single Debian group distribution
apis.description: Gets a single Debian group distribution.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: codename
attributes.description: The codename of a distribution.

apis.name: Single Debian group distribution key
